title: Imperial Home Adjustable Waist Trimmer Workout Belt
description: This waist trimmer belt helps you to hide your belly and also a good addition to any exercise program while this waist trimmer wraps around your belly to shed excess water weight by using the sauna effect. It can breathe through the belt as you are sweating and loosing weight underneath. Fits waist sizes 25 - 55 inches. Made from soft, neoprene material so that it feels comfortable as you do your daily routines.
